post.author: 구게시판
post.content:
Eagle professional(I.T. Satffing Agency)에서 다음과 같이 I.T.분야 Contractor로 일하고자 하거나 일하는 분들을 대상으로 '좀더 바람직하게 Agency와 일하는 방법'을 주제로 Information Session을 가진다고 하니 관심있는 분 들의 참석을 바랍니다.

---- Invitaion --------------------------------------------------------

Are you an I.T. professional new to contracting? Or, a seasoned I.T.
professional who would like to get better results from the agencies that
you work with?

Eagle Professional Resources Inc. is proud to present:

\\"Working with I.T. Staffing Agencies\\"

Join Eagle's Vice President,  Frances McCart, for an enlightening
information session on the I.T. staffing world.   This presentation will
give you an insiders view of how agencies operate plus some practical ideas
for selecting agencies to work with.

There will be a Q & A period following the presentation, to address any
additional questions.

DATE:     June 21, 2001
TIME:     5:30 p.m.
PLACE:    Toronto Marriot Eaton Centre
         525 Bay St.


Please feel free to bring along I.T. colleagues that would also benefit
from this seminar.  And, who knows, you may also be the lucky winner of
some of our latest Eagle gear!!

Please RSVP to Ainsley_Allen@eagleonline.com
post.title: [2001/06/14] Eagle information session for I.T. contractors (작성자: COSKA JP)
